Articles.Content:
I was working on a rover today in the SPH, and I saw some vehicles drifting and thought to myself "Hey, I'd like to do that with them". I then thought, again to myself, "Let's ask if we can have that!" So now I'm here asking squad to make it so you can go into the buildings of the space center (SPH, VAB, Astronaut complex, ect.) while in-flight. I can understand if this will take multiple updates to work on, like multiplayer is.

Support?
As far as I know, VAB and SPH buildings were designed as single model but then the interior and exterior were separated to keep the polygon count lower.

If you tried to go in the SPH/VAB with a Kerbal you'd see the behinds of the metal bars which are textureless and see-through. Not very pretty. And they're done like that for a reason: Polycount.

Betcha KSP2 will have it though

"Guys, when will we get 128-bit support? All these mods are filling up the space. Too much for 64 bit."
